message: I have a great deal for you on this amazing product! I think you'll really love it.
Thanks for the offer, Alice, but $180 is a bit steep for me. I'm interested in the product, but I'd be willing to pay around $100 for it. What do you say?
I can see you're interested in the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $140 for the product, but I need to make a profit, so I'm not going any lower than that.
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, Alice. How about we settle at $115? That's a fair compromise.

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I've already met you halfway and compromised on the price. I'm willing to give you a slight discount, but I need to make a profit. I can do $135 for the product.
